home.title: Prisma Clinic Marbella
home.description: At Prisma Clinic Marbella, we provide exceptional dental and aesthetic care with compassion and precision. Our team of experienced professionals uses advanced technology to ensure your comfort while delivering comprehensive treatments for all your oral health needs. From routine cleanings to cosmetic procedures, we are committed to giving you a healthy, beautiful smile.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We utilize cutting-edge dental and aesthetic technologies to deliver premium care. Our advanced equipment ensures precision and comfort, enhancing both your smile and facial appearance with exceptional results.

general.title: General Practitioner
general.heading: Comprehensive General Practitioner Services
general.description: High-quality primary healthcare services providing personalized care for patients of all ages, from routine check-ups to chronic disease management and preventive medicine.

dental.title: Dental
dental.heading: Premium Dental Care for Your Perfect Smile
dental.description: State-of-the-art dental facility offering comprehensive dental services from routine care to advanced cosmetic and surgical procedures, available 24/7 for emergencies.

aesthetics.title: Aesthetics
aesthetics.heading: Advanced Aesthetic Treatments
aesthetics.description: Prisma Clinic Marbella offers premium aesthetic treatments with cutting-edge technology and techniques to help you look and feel your best.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Dental Care for the Whole Family
comprehensive.description: At Prisma Clinic Marbella, we offer a wide range of services to meet all your dental needs. From preventive care to cosmetic dentistry, our experienced team is committed to providing personalized treatment in a comfortable and welcoming environment.

general.title: General Dentistry
general.description: Comprehensive check-ups, cleanings, fillings, and preventive care to maintain your oral health and prevent future problems.

cosmetic.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
cosmetic.description: Transform your smile with our range of cosmetic services including teeth whitening, veneers, bonding, and smile makeovers.

restorative.title: Restorative Dentistry
restorative.description: Restore damaged or missing teeth with crowns, bridges, implants, and dentures to regain full function and confidence.

pediatric.title: Pediatric Dental Care
pediatric.description: Specialized gentle care for children, creating positive dental experiences and establishing good oral health habits from an early age.

testimonial.text: The team at Prisma Clinic Marbella made my dental visit so comfortable and stress-free. Their gentle approach and attention to detail completely changed my perspective on dental care.

emergency.title: 24/7 Emergency Dental Care
emergency.description: Dental emergencies don't wait for business hours. Our team of specialists is available around the clock to provide immediate care when you need it most.

contact.title: 24/7 Emergency Dental Care
contact.description: Dental emergencies don't wait for business hours. Our team of specialists is available around the clock to provide immediate care when you need it most.

page.title: Our Services
page.subtitle: Comprehensive healthcare solutions in Marbella
page.description: Prisma Clinic Marbella provides a wide range of premium medical and dental services, including emergency care available 24/7. Our team of specialists is dedicated to providing exceptional care using cutting-edge technology.

testimonial.content: The team at Prisma Clinic Marbella transformed my dental experience. Their professional approach and state-of-the-art technology made my treatment comfortable and effective. I couldn't be happier with the results.

dental.title: Premium Dental Services
summary: Our dental department offers a comprehensive range of services including general dentistry, cosmetic treatments, implants, orthodontics, and 24/7 emergency dental care.
Using the latest technology and the most advanced techniques, our experienced dentists provide personalized treatment plans to maintain and improve your oral health and smile's aesthetics.

testimonial.author: Maria L.
testimonial.content: The dental care at Prisma Clinic is exceptional. From regular check-ups to my recent cosmetic procedure, the team has always provided professional and comfortable treatment.

aesthetics.title: Advanced Aesthetic Treatments
summary: Our aesthetics department specializes in non-surgical rejuvenation treatments, including Botox, dermal fillers, lip enhancement, and other facial aesthetic procedures.
Our qualified specialists create natural-looking results that enhance your features while maintaining facial harmony, helping you achieve a rejuvenated and youthful appearance.

testimonial.author: Sofia R.
testimonial.content: The aesthetic treatments at Prisma Clinic delivered exactly what I wanted: a subtle improvement that looks completely natural. The experience and attention to detail of the team is outstanding.

hero.title: Prisma Clinic Marbella Aesthetics
hero.description: State-of-the-art aesthetics clinic offering comprehensive beauty and rejuvenation services for natural and surprising results.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Our modern facilities and experienced aesthetic specialists ensure patients receive the highest quality care for all their beauty and rejuvenation needs. We pride ourselves on providing personalized treatment plans tailored to each patient's specific requirements.

treatments.title: Eyelid Lifting

treatments.title: Nasal Tip Lifting

generalMedicine.title: Comprehensive Medical Care
summary: Our general practitioner services provide holistic primary healthcare including preventative medicine, chronic disease management, diagnostic services, and treatment for acute conditions.
Our experienced doctors take the time to understand your health concerns and provide personalized care that addresses your specific needs, ensuring your overall wellbeing.

testimonial.author: Robert P.
testimonial.content: Having access to reliable primary care at Prisma Clinic has made managing my health so much easier. The personal attention and comprehensive approach is exactly what I needed.

hero.title: 24/7 Emergency Dental Care
hero.description: Immediate dental attention when you need it most. Available 24 hours a day, every day of the year in Marbella.

services.title: Emergency Services
services.description: Dental emergencies can happen at any time. At Prisma Clinic Marbella, we provide immediate care for all dental emergencies, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Our team of specialists is always ready to provide prompt treatment to relieve your pain and address urgent dental issues.

conditions.title: Emergency Dental Conditions
conditions.description: Our emergency dental care covers a wide range of urgent conditions:

toothache.title: Severe Toothache
toothache.description: Immediate pain relief and treatment for intense dental pain

broken.title: Broken or Chipped Teeth
broken.description: Quick restoration of damaged teeth to prevent further complications

knockedOut.title: Knocked-Out Teeth
knockedOut.description: Emergency replantation and treatment for avulsed teeth

lostRestorations.title: Lost Crowns or Fillings
lostRestorations.description: Immediate replacement of lost dental restorations

abscess.title: Dental Abscess
abscess.description: Urgent treatment for painful dental infections

trauma.title: Dental Trauma
trauma.description: Expert care for teeth and gum injuries from accidents

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Our Emergency Dental Service

availability.title: Available 24/7
availability.description: Our team is available around the clock, including weekends and holidays

sameDay.title: Same-Day Treatment
sameDay.description: Immediate appointments for all emergency cases

location.title: Central Marbella Location
location.description: Easily accessible clinic in the heart of Marbella

payment.title: Multiple Payment Options
payment.description: We accept all major insurance plans and offer flexible payment options

call.title: Call Our Hotline
call.description: Contact our 24/7 emergency line at +34 673 290 786 to speak with our team

describe.title: Describe the Emergency
describe.description: Our specialists will assess your situation and provide immediate advice

come.title: Come to Our Clinic
come.description: We'll prepare for your arrival and provide immediate treatment upon your arrival

testimonial.quote: I had a terrible toothache at 2 AM and didn't know what to do. I called Prisma Clinic Marbella's emergency line, and they saw me right away. The pain was gone within an hour, and I received exceptional care. I am so grateful they're available 24/7!

callToAction.title: Need Emergency Dental Care?
callToAction.description: Don't wait until it's too late. Contact our emergency dental service in Marbella now.
